name: Eiffel Tower Suite
description: A stunning view of the iconic Eiffel Tower from your window. Experience the romance of Paris.

name: Kyoto Serenity Garden
description: Find peace and tranquility in a traditional Japanese ryokan surrounded by beautiful gardens.

name: Santorini Caldera View
description: Wake up to breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea and the volcanic caldera.

name: NYC Times Square Loft
description: A modern loft in the heart of the city that never sleeps. Steps away from Broadway.

name: Bora Bora Overwater Bungalow
description: Escape to paradise in a luxurious overwater bungalow with direct lagoon access.
